snippet: Chief Ray Schultz of the Albuquerque Police Department said he would retire this summer or fall. The announcement came amid a federal investigation of the department.
abstract: Chief Ray Schultz of Albuquerque Police Department says he will retire in summer or fall 2013; announcement comes amid federal investigation of department, which has been accused of excessive force by officers.
lead_paragraph: Chief Ray Schultz of the Albuquerque Police Department said he would retire this summer or fall. The announcement came amid a federal investigation of the department.

headline.seo: New Mexico: Police Chief to Retire
headline.main: New Mexico: Police Chief to Retire
headline.print_headline: New Mexico: Police Chief To Retire
